description:
Effortlessly scan documents, photos, and more with your network-enabled scanner

ScanBridge is a Material You app featuring scanning of documents, photos, and more over the AirScan/eSCL protocol. AirScan/eSCL is a widely supported protocol that allows you to connect to network-enabled scanners over your network and scan your documents without the need for any additional software or drivers.

Features:

  • Discover scanners supporting eSCL in your network
  • Scan multiple pages and arrange them however you like
  • Use your scanner to the maximum of its capabilities by adjusting settings like input source, resolution, duplex scan, scanning dimensions, and more
  • Save your scans as PDF or images & directly share them with other apps
  • Nice-looking Material You design
  • Easy-to-use interface

ScanBridge is free and open-source, with no ads or tracking. It is designed to be privacy-friendly and does not require any permissions, except the Internet permission to access the network scanner, which is already automatically granted by Android. No data/telemetry is collected.
